body.name: Karaoke Machine with 2 Wireless Microphones,Portable Bluetooth 5.1 Speaker for Adults Kids,Bass/Treble Adjustment,PA System with Remote Control, Lights, Supports TF Card/USB, AUX in,TWS,FM,REC Party
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 4 hrs 23 mins
features: 【Perfect HD Stereo Karaoke Sound Quality】Equipped with the high-power and upgraded audio driver and an advanced digital signal processor in the bluetooth speakers, it makes sound quality clearer and more balanced and the bass stronger, and gives you 360°stereo surround sound effects.Built-in 5.25” subwoofer and 2” tweeter, for full range stereo sound reproduction and amplifying your voice, will not distort the audio even in higher volumes.

【Multi-functional & Easy to Use】Voijump Karaoke machine supports 5.1 Bluetooth, Flash USB, a Micro TF card ,FM radio and AUX-in connectivity, which ensure the instant pairing with your Bluetooth devices (such as moblie phone, iPad, tablet and PC). You can have a remote control with them. With a 6.35 microphone input on the operation panel, which also works for guitars. The unique groove design allows you to place your phone or iPad on the karaoke system.

【Large Capacity Battery & 2 Wireless Microphones】With high-performance capacity battery (built-in 3.7V/5200mAh rechargeable large-capacity lithium-ion battery), low power consumption, you can play the music for 6 to 8 hours continuously on a full charge, which standby for 72 hours, 10 hours for normal playtime. With two wireless mic, just turn on the karaoke machine and press the microphone's power button, it'll automatically pair up. Very Easy to use.

【Colorful Dynamic Disco Lights】Colorful disco LED lights on this PA system, you can switch lights with independent button, also it can change with the rhythm of music, which can create a wonderful and romantic music atmosphere in party.

【Powerful TWS Mode】By connecting two identical stereo systems, the powerful stereo will be synchronized, allowing you to be surrounded by 2 channels, let you immerse yourself in beautiful and powerful music.

【Lightweight & Portable】Voijump Karaoke Machine is made of exquisite and durable solid wood/leather.The total weight is 6.3 lb, so it is lightweight. It also attached to a shoulder strap, you can carry it anywhere and enjoy your music anytime. Suitable for party, weddings, ,family gatherings, etc.
【Satisfied Warranty】We provide 24-Hour online support and 1-Year warranty on this Karaoke machine. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. 100% Satisfaction for you.

Stereo HD Sound Quality--Powerful Immersive Sound and Deep Bass Independent treble/bass/echo control , and built in 5.25 inch bass and 2 inch treble,make you have wonderful ear enjoyment.

Automatically Pair Up & Dynamic LED light With two wireless mic, just turn on the karaoke machine and press the microphone's power button, it'll automatically pair up.Colorful disco LED lights on this PA system, you can switch lights with independent button, also it can change with the rhythm of music, which can create a wonderful and romantic music atmosphere in party. Lightweight & Remote Control FM radio can automatically search and save available stations .You can listen it anywhere. Built in antenna for radio enthusiast. Also you can use remote control to adjust the karaoke machine freely to get rid of the distance.Lightweight and handheld size. With a durable handle and extra adjustable shoulder strap, you can carry it anywhere in convenience. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little fun
reviews.reviewText: I looked long time for home karaoke machine and I found the one. This machine is small but loud enough and sound quality is great. We had hours of fun when we got it. I haven't figure out how to record yet but it is a nice feature. Thinking of getting two more microphones for all of us here. Its light, portable and easy connecting to our TV. We live it and hope it last .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a well made and not too big or small. It has everything you need the mic, great sound and a color show. Very entertaining for everyone. Price is good. This is also great for a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good karaoke machine for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Nice compact karaoke machine in the shape of a suitcase. The Bluetooth connection works well and the sound is good. The 2 microphones sound is clear and sharp. There is also a radio feature. The price is good for the quality of the karaoke machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was hoping for!
reviews.reviewText: Speaker unit is smaller and lighter than I expected - very nice. It has a small handle and a shoulder strap, makes it convenient to carry. Microphone connection is instant and sound is great. Easy to connect my phone to the speaker unit. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great machine for the money!
reviews.reviewText: The speaker is about what I expected for this price range, and only has distortion if you are speaking too loud into it. Both mics work well with a little static. Makes for a pretty good bluetooth speaker when not in use with the mics, but it's a bit metallic at times.I would defiantly recommend this for use with kids or family fun, but it is by no means a professional or hobbyist level of quality for karaoke. We mostly play music through our home system and only sing through the machine speaker, and that seems to make it a better quality experience.Only a couple downsides: The remote seems to mess with our soundbar in our living room so we quit using it, and I don't think there are any settings for the LED lights onboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it works amazing the sound is fantastic and it’s great for karaoke it’s amazing you will love it I do and so does my family

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a fun Christmas gift!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 children have been able to sing together since opening this Christmas morning. Great controls, easy set up. Good quality sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay at home fun!!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this, and it arrived quickly. They even included the batteries for the microphones and remote! I haven’t laughed this hard in a long time. It was fun for all ages and everyone participated. The quality is excellent, worth every penny. Can’t wait to use it again at the next family gathering.
